constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2 no. rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The proposed Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2 no. rooflights to front roof slope falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Please provide Existing and Proposed Side Elevations at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is encouraged. We request Side Elevations as the proposal extends beyond the height of adjoining buildings. If you do not wish to provide these then the case Officer may request these at a later date.
